Title: Boxed In
Plot: While on investigation at a shipyard, looking for smuggled weapons, Tony and Ziva dissapear and it's up to NCIS to find them. Abby tries to track them down by tracking down their GPS chips, but they seem to be out of reach. Meanwhile, Tony and Ziva, hiding in a container, find evidence which could help them solve the case.
GuestStars: Daniel Roebuck, James Martin Kelly, Morocco Omari, Tony Armatrading
